results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07 is an iteration in the popular EA sports golf series. Starring Tiger himself, the game includes improved visuals over previous games and a large cast of superstar golfers such as Phil Mickelson and Vijay Singh.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 07

results.deck: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter 2 puts the player back into the action as a member of the Ghost squad as they try to stop prevent the Mexican Civil war from spilling over into the USA
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter 2

results.deck: Splinter Cell: Double Agent puts a new spin on the series, placing Sam Fisher undercover in a terrorist group, where moral decisions affect gameplay.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Double Agent

results.deck: The fifth main installment of Sega-AM2's signature fighting game series, using PC-based arcade hardware to deliver the most advanced graphical capabilities of video games at the time. It's also known for its numerous updates and major revisions (spanning all the way up to 2015, nearly 10 years after the original game's release).
results.name: Virtua Fighter 5

results.deck: Originally released for the Japan-exclusive MSX2 in 1990, this sequel is set four years after the Outer Heaven incident. New FOXHOUND commander, Roy Campbell, brings a shell-shocked Solid Snake back from early retirement to infiltrate the military nation Zanzibar Land.
results.name: Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake

results.deck: Ridge Racer 7 is a Playstation 3 exclusive and a launch title. It is similar to Ridge Racer 6, but adds many new courses, as well as a new UI, progression structure, and soundtrack.
results.name: Ridge Racer 7

results.deck: Play as Lyra in attempt to save her father in this game based on the novel adapted movie of the same name.
results.name: The Golden Compass

results.deck: The sequel to Rainbow Six: Vegas returns with a brand new story of terrorist attacks and the Rainbow squad's attempt to stop them.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas 2

results.deck: Reducing the four-man squad to two specialised roles, the Conflict series moves to a first-person perspective with an emphasis on co-operation and destructive action.
results.name: Conflict: Denied Ops

results.deck: The fourth main Call of Duty game ditches the World War II setting of the past games to tell a story set in contemporary times, and backs it up with a breakthrough multiplayer mode.
results.name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare

results.deck: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer follows a closer look into the movie, including chases with the Silver Surfer and fights with Dr. Doom. It also contains extra missions including finding scientists to save the world. It allows four player to each control a member of the Fantastic Four.
results.name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer

results.deck: The first Formula 1 game to be released on the PlayStation 3, it was developed by the SCEE Liverpool Studio. This was the last Formula 1 game to be released exclusively on a PlayStation platform before Sony lost the F1 license to Codemasters.
results.name: Formula One Championship Edition

results.deck: Assassin's Creed is a stealth action-adventure game developed by Ubisoft Montreal. In the year 2012, Desmond Miles is kidnapped and made to relive his ancestor's memory through a machine called the Animus. As the ancestor, Alta√Ør, players unveil an assassin conspiracy set in the middle ages.
results.name: Assassin's Creed

results.deck: The first game in the legendary Monkey Island series. Guybrush's desire to become a swashbuckling pirate gets him more adventure than he bargained for.
results.name: The Secret of Monkey Island

results.deck: A reboot of sorts for the Rainbow Six series, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas drops the player into a fictional version of Las Vegas to stop a terrorist plot.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas

results.deck: DiRT is an off-road rally racing game and is the sixth game in the Colin McRae series of games.
results.name: DiRT

results.deck: The fourth instalment of the series (Guitar Hero: Rock the 80's being the 3rd) that single handedly revitalized the music-game genre, Guitar Hero III retains the core gameplay of its predecessors while delivering a more challenging experience.
results.name: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock

results.deck: Prototype is an open-world action game from Radical Entertainment. You are Alex Mercer, a human transformed by a deadly virus into a virtually invincible killing machine.
results.name: Prototype

results.deck: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando is the sequel to Ratchet & Clank and the second game in the long-running franchise developed by Insomniac Games.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando

results.deck: F.E.A.R. is a first-person shooter borrowing elements from Japanese horror. It employs bullet time abilities and large quantities of blood to create a gory action experience.
results.name: F.E.A.R.: First Encounter Assault Recon

results.deck: Frontline follows the European Theater, starting with the Normandy Beach landings.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Frontline

results.deck: Ratchet & Clank:  Up Your Arsenal is the third game in the Ratchet and Clank series. It is also the first to include online play.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal

results.deck: The first game in the Legend of Heroes VI Sora no Kiseki trilogy. Follow Estelle and Joshua Bright on their journey to become Senior Bracers.
results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky

results.deck: NHL 07 was the 16th game of the NHL franchise from EA Sports.
results.name: NHL 07

results.deck: In Electronic Arts' Skate, you create a skater and complete various photo and video challenges to get sponsors and become well known in the skating world as you appear on magazines such as Skateboard Mag and Thrasher.
results.name: skate.

results.deck: An action-adventure hack n' slash title for the Nintendo Wii. In it, players follow otaku Travis Touchdown in his quest to become the highest-ranked assassin in the world (and, perhaps, get together with the mysterious Sylvia Christel).
results.name: No More Heroes

results.deck: The web-slinging, joke cracking, Spider-Man is back. The third game in the movie tie-in series sees Spider-Man battle more foes than ever and even get a new makeover, and of course,  it offers plenty of swinging around the city.
results.name: Spider-Man 3

results.deck: Burnout Paradise turns the Burnout series on its head by moving from closed set tracks to an open world full of events to experience both alone and in a group online.
results.name: Burnout Paradise
World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets

results.deck: Take on the role of a paratrooper in the US 82nd Airborne Division during World War II. Fight to retake control of Europe during several key campaigns in Italy, Netherlands, France, and Germany.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Airborne

results.deck: Under Defeat is a shoot 'em up developed by G.rev.
results.name: Under Defeat

results.deck: TimeShift is a First-Person Shooter that puts you into the shoes of a nameless scientist who dons a suit with the ability to stop, slow down, and rewind time.
results.name: TimeShift

results.deck: An action-strategy game set during the Hundred-Years' War, the player controls a mercenary, growing in stature by helping to secure each victory.
results.name: Bladestorm: The Hundred Years' War

results.deck: Explore the Forbidden Land as Wander, a young warrior who must slay sixteen Colossi in order to restore the life of a sacrificed maiden.
results.name: Shadow of the Colossus

results.deck: The fourth game in the popular Capcom action franchise, Devil May Cry. Take on the role of new playable character Nero, as he uses his swanky demon arm to beat the hell out of a demon invasion in the castle town of Fortuna.
results.name: Devil May Cry 4

results.deck: Known as the first stealth-action game, Metal Gear tells the tale of Solid Snake, a rookie operative of the U.S. special forces unit FOXHOUND, as he infiltrates Outer Heaven, a fortified military compound, to destroy a mysterious superweapon known as "Metal Gear".
results.name: Metal Gear

results.deck: Team up as Homer, Marge, Bart, and Lisa as you enter a strange and vast video game world, with parodies of popular series like EverQuest, Medal of Honor, and Grand Theft Auto. Popluar video-game characters such as Sonic and Mario have their own parodies too.
results.name: The Simpsons Game

results.deck: The follow-up to Vice City takes the Grand Theft Auto series' free-roaming violence into 1992 and the fictional state of San Andreas as several criminal gangs wage war for control of the streets.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

results.deck: Take control of Crash Bandicoot in his first adventure to stop the evil Doctor Neo Cortex and Nitrus Brio from taking over the world.
results.name: Crash Bandicoot

results.deck: The third main installment of the well-known first-person shooter series, Call of Duty 3 returns to World War II Europe in an inter-connected campaign that switches between America, British, Canadian, and Polish forces during the liberation of France.
results.name: Call of Duty 3

results.deck: Take control of some of the most iconic superheroes of the Marvel Universe in this squad-based RPG. Form a well known group such as the Fantastic Four or create your own custom group of heroes to battle Dr. Doom and the Masters of Evil.
results.name: Marvel Ultimate Alliance

results.deck: Surf's Up is a multiplatform game developed by Ubisoft based on the movie of the same name. As a variety of avian characters from the movie, players compete in surfing challenges.
results.name: Surf's Up

results.deck: The answers to the mystery of the past lie within the Folk-ridden Netherworld, waiting for you to explore.
results.name: Folklore

results.deck: Nariko, an outcast in her clan, wields the cursed Heavenly Sword in order to defeat the evil King Bohan.
results.name: Heavenly Sword

results.deck: Fight Night Round 3 is a boxing game developed by EA Chicago that has been released on multiple platforms.
results.name: Fight Night Round 3

results.deck: A golfing simulation with real life courses, golfers, and equipment.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 08

results.deck: Visual Concepts returns to the gridiron with the greatest football players of all-time taking the field once again in All-Pro Football 2K8.
results.name: All-Pro Football 2K8

results.deck: The third game in the 'Soldier of Fortune' series brings its signature blood-soaked gameplay to the Playstation 3, Xbox 360, and PC.
results.name: Soldier of Fortune: Payback

results.deck: The successor to Need for Speed: Most Wanted brought a continued storyline and new race types, but now with a lesser focus on police chases.
results.name: Need for Speed: Carbon

results.deck: The second game release from THQ based on Pixar's computer animated movie, Cars.
results.name: Disney/Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship

results.deck: FIFA 06 boasts anew intuitive game play engine for a fast and attacking experience.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 06

results.deck: On his 21st birthday, Jackie Estacado gets possessed by an entity known as The Darkness. After getting into trouble with the Mafia, Jackie finds himself on the run, trying to protect the people most important to him.
results.name: The Darkness

results.deck: Follow the story of Rohn, a dragon rider, along his path of exploration as he discovers just what he is fighting for.
results.name: Lair

results.deck: The story of a forsaken boy with horns and a mysterious girl who must work together to escape from the confines of an enormous castle.
results.name: ICO

results.deck: Resistance: Fall of Man is the first in a franchise of first-person shooters from Insomniac Games. Set in an alternative version of 1951, you follow the story of Sgt. Nathan Hale as he and the human resistance forces attempt to drive a mysterious alien-like invasion out of Britain.
results.name: Resistance: Fall of Man

results.deck: NBA 2K7 is the eighth installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2006/2007 NBA season while improving the online play and adding every athlete's "signature style".
results.name: NBA 2K7

results.deck: Rock Band expands on the concepts Harmonix established in its Guitar Hero franchise by allowing players to play guitar, bass, drums, and sing to a variety of songs from various sub-genres and time periods.
results.name: Rock Band

results.deck: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner is a sci-fi action-adventure game produced by Hideo Kojima. The game features fast-paced mech battles and a very elaborate story.
results.name: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner

results.deck: NBA Street Homecourt is the fourth game in the over-the-top basketball series by EA Sports BIG. It features a heavy emphasis on crazy tricks and even crazier dunks where teams of 3 compete to see who is truly the king of the court.
results.name: NBA Street Homecourt

results.deck: Play as Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann, and the infamous Captain Jack Sparrow in this video game adaptation of the third film in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise.
results.name: Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End

results.deck: A squad-based FPS with a story by the acclaimed horror writer Clive Barker. The player controls a team of seven characters, equipped with both firearms and supernatural powers, as they uncover the secrets of an ancient Middle Eastern city full of ghastly creatures.
results.name: Clive Barker's Jericho

results.deck: Eternal Sonata is a fantasy RPG developed by tri-Crescendo that tells an alternate history story of Fr√©d√©ric Chopin's final moments.
results.name: Eternal Sonata

results.deck: Enter the Shivering Isles, the lands ruled by the Daedric Prince of Madness, Sheogorath. Battle your way through the twisted landscape, become the champion of Sheogorath, and help save the isles from the destructive Greymarch.
results.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Shivering Isles

results.deck: The third main installment of the fast-paced arena-based first-person shooter brings its futuristic world to the Unreal Engine 3 game engine while adding a grimy aesthetic and a new story-based single-player campaign (involving a crew of mercenaries set out to avenge their fallen colony against the Necris).
results.name: Unreal Tournament 3

results.deck: In this unsuccessful reboot of the Turok franchise, space marine Joseph Turok must hunt down his former mentor and fight for survival on an alien planet filled with hostile soldiers, genetically-engineered dinosaurs, and other dangerous monsters.
results.name: Turok

results.deck: EA Sports brings its NASCAR series to the Seventh Generation gaming consoles with NASCAR 08.
results.name: NASCAR 08

results.deck: This family friendly game combines Lego Star Wars, and Lego Star Wars: The Original Trilogy, into one adventure spanning the entire Star Wars universe.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga

results.deck: Zone of the Enders is a fast-paced action game in which you play as Leo Stenbuck, the reluctant pilot of the orbital frame Jehuty.  With Jehuty you must protect the Jupiter space colony known as Antilla from an invading force known as Bahram.
results.name: Zone of the Enders

results.deck: This RPG focuses on a band of warriors attempting to stop the Queen of Ice from resurrecting ancient golems which could destroy the world. The game is similar in formula to Final Fantasy titles and uses randomly triggered encounters.
results.name: Enchanted Arms

results.deck: The third main entry in the Soul series, Soulcalibur II is best known for its release on all three major consoles at the time, each of them featuring their own exclusive guest character.
results.name: Soulcalibur II

results.deck: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix lets the player control characters from the book and movie of the same name around a recreated Hogwarts castle, using magic and performing tasks along the way.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Project 8 was the first game in the Tony Hawk series built from the ground up for 7th generation of consoles. The game introduced the Nail-The-Trick mechanic and added graphical details like Bloom HDR lighting and ragdoll physics.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Project 8

results.deck: What if Winston Churchill was killed in an accident before World War II began? What if the war wouldn't have ended? Spark Unlimited's Turning Point adds an alternate history scenario to the well-populated subgenre.
results.name: Turning Point: Fall of Liberty

results.deck: The sequel to the 360 exclusive was, in fact PS3 exclusive.
results.name: Full Auto 2: Battlelines

results.deck: Stuntman: Ignition lets you live out the dream of getting paid to drive recklessly and with no concern for the law as you help film stunts for fictional movies.
results.name: Stuntman: Ignition

results.deck: The follow-up to the 1998 blockbuster, Metal Gear Solid 2 blends tactical stealth and action. This sequel takes the action to an offshore oil cleanup facility seized by terrorists who are holding the President hostage. It helped sell the PS2, featuring advanced AI, physics and cover mechanics for its time, and one of the first postmodern narratives in gaming.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

results.deck: WWE Smackdown vs. Raw 2008 is an iteration in the Smackdown vs Raw series. This version included Fighting Styles and a new struggle submission system as well as the ECW brand.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2008

results.deck: This game is the second release in the PixelJunk series on PSN. PixelJunk Monsters is an RTS game in which you build up your defenses to protect your base against threatening monsters.
results.name: PixelJunk Monsters

results.deck: The seventh rendition of the popular, long running soccer simulator Pro Evolution Soccer. The game is available on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, Wii, Nintendo DS, Xbox 360, and PC.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2008

results.deck: Untold Legends: Dark Kingdom is a hack and slash RPG game which was one of the launch titles on the PS3.
results.name: Untold Legends: Dark Kingdom

results.deck: Become the Don by extorting businesses, racketeering, whacking rivals and starting gang wars across the whole of New York City. Welcome to the family.
results.name: The Godfather: The Game

results.deck: In Blazing Angels, you take the role of an American pilot and fly, shoot, and bomb your way through the German army along with some American buddies. The game "Secret Weapons Over Normandy" was cited by the developer as a big influence on this games development.
results.name: Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII

results.deck: Return to the roots of filmmaker John Woo's "heroic bloodshed" films of the early 90s with the video game sequel to one of Woo's most notable films.
results.name: John Woo Presents Stranglehold

results.deck: Become Nathan Drake, a treasure hunter and descendant of famed explorer Sir Francis Drake as he searches for the lost treasure of El Dorado.
results.name: Uncharted: Drake's Fortune

results.deck: Doom 3, a more story-focused remake of the original Doom, is a sci-fi first-person-shooter that was widely considered the most graphically advanced game available for its time.
results.name: Doom 3

results.deck: Splatterhouse is a remarkably gory, splatter-themed arcade game from 1988. The player controls Rick Taylor, who allows himself to be possessed by the sinister "Terror Mask" in an attempt to save his girlfriend Jennifer from the hideous monsters who have kidnapped her.
results.name: Splatterhouse

results.deck: In the sixth installment in Insomniac's popular action series, Ratchet and his robotic sidekick Clank must stop an insane intergalactic emperor, Tachyon, from conquering the entire Polaris galaxy.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank Future: Tools of Destruction

results.deck: Genji: Days of the Blade is a hack-and-slash action game based on Japanese historical folklore.  It is a sequel to the PlayStation 2 game Genji: Dawn of the Samurai.
results.name: Genji: Days of the Blade

results.deck: Sly 2: Band of Thieves follows the Cooper Gang as they attempt to recover the dismantled parts of Clockwerk from an international criminal and spice dealing organization known as the Klaww Gang.
results.name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves

results.deck: The story of a young, curious, and green-loving photojournalist named Jade, out to unravel an alien conspiracy on her home planet of Hillys.
results.name: Beyond Good & Evil

results.deck: flOw was conceived as a college project by creator Jenova Chen, whose company later ported the game to the PlayStation Network with upgraded graphics and motion control.
results.name: flOw

results.deck: Combining the addictive casual gameplay of puzzle game Bejeweled with a fantasy role-playing game, Puzzle Quest was an unexpected hit on every platform it touched.
results.name: Puzzle Quest: Challenge of the Warlords

results.deck: The Eye of Judgment is an interactive turn-based card game from Sony Computer Entertainment Japan that uses the PlayStation Eye camera and a deck of real cards.
results.name: The Eye of Judgment

results.deck: Madden NFL 07 was the first version of Madden to appear on the Wii and the PS3.  It also added lead blocking controls along with numerous other new features.
results.name: Madden NFL 07

results.deck: Transform and roll out with many of the characters from the live-action movie in this epic action game.
results.name: Transformers: The Game

results.deck: Def Jam: Icon is a fighting game that has rappers in place of the standard fighting game fare.
results.name: Def Jam: Icon

results.deck: Humanity is still a newcomer on the futuristic galactic stage, and it's up to the charismatic Commander Shepard to investigate the actions of a rogue agent while under threat from a dangerous synthetic race known as the Geth.
results.name: Mass Effect

results.deck: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is the second 3D game in the series and sixth original title. It features more of the same sand-box action-adventure gameplay with a new 1980s setting, new characters, new weapons and much more.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

results.deck: Venture into the mysterious, Utopian underwater city of Rapture and discover what has turned it into ruin in this first-person epic.
results.name: BioShock
